page.title: 06MODES OF TRANSPORT
page.content: In our area most people have a car. Among the school pupils all the families have a car except one. They usually cycle to town. There is a bus service with the buses running eight times a day to Inverness and twice on a Saturday. In our school when we have outings we hire buses to take us to various places. If you want a taxi you have to phone to Inverness for one. Most taxis are just normal cars with taxi signs on them. There is a train line running through our block but the station at Bunchrew is now closed and the trains run straight through from Inverness to Beauly.
